name: Strikeball
overview: Strikeball is a version of baseball with a few rule changes. You can set the number of innings played. Pitching you can determine fast, slow or medium pitch. Field with outfield and shortstop, bases cannot run, only throw. You get credit for each base taken as a run, home runs are given 5 runs. If a fielder tags the base before the running he is out, but gets credit for each base already touched. Fielders must throw to bases, cannot tag the runner out themselves. Released on United Public Domain Games disk PG181 and BAB Micro Center Domaine Public No3465.
